Metadata.name: Better Vending Machines
Metadata.author: MeovvCAT
Metadata.description:
A standalone portion of P4GEX.
Makes Orange Smash and TaP Soda stock in Shopping District South separate and increased to 9 per week.
Removes the RNG component from the machine in District North, but limits the stock to 15 (Total) to compensate.
Adds a "Buy Everything" option to both machines which empties out the remaining available stock.
